How to use this program.

Run the program for a given bed file following the usage in the program itself.
To visualize the output file, go to the UCSC Genome Browser and navigate to the 
"Genome Graphs" utility in the "Tools" tab.

You will then want to click on "Upload" and then add the output text file
generated by this program.

From there, you can use the GUI options on the Genome Graphs tool to produce
the desired visualization.
